languages.text: "Покаяние в тюрьме — тень истинного преображения души. Только в бою, отринув плотское и облачив душу пламенем, можно заслужить прощение".

traits.locale_text: "Покаяние в тюрьме — тень истинного преображения души. Только в бою, отринув плотское и облачив душу пламенем, можно заслужить прощение".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Repentance in prison is but a weak shadow of a true transformation of the soul. Only in battle, by abjuring the flesh and cloaking the soul in flame, can one earn absolution."
languages.original_text: "Покаяние в тюрьме — тень истинного преображения души. Только в бою, отринув плотское и облачив душу пламенем, можно заслужить прощение".

traits.locale_text: "Repentance in prison is but a weak shadow of a true transformation of the soul. Only in battle, by abjuring the flesh and cloaking the soul in flame, can one earn absolution."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Repentance in prison is but a weak shadow of a true transformation of the soul. Only in battle, by abjuring the flesh and cloaking the soul in flame, can one earn absolution."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Repentance in prison is but a weak shadow of a true transformation of the soul. Only in battle, by abjuring the flesh and cloaking the soul in flame, can one earn absolution."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Repentance in prison is but a weak shadow of a true transformation of the soul. Only in battle, by abjuring the flesh and cloaking the soul in flame, can one earn absolution."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “监狱中的忏悔，不过是灵魂真正转变过程中微不足道的一小步。只有通过战斗，舍弃你的肉体，让你的灵魂笼罩在烈焰之中，才能得到赦免。”
languages.original_text: "Repentance in prison is but a weak shadow of a true transformation of the soul. Only in battle, by abjuring the flesh and cloaking the soul in flame, can one earn absolution."

traits.locale_text: “监狱中的忏悔，不过是灵魂真正转变过程中微不足道的一小步。只有通过战斗，舍弃你的肉体，让你的灵魂笼罩在烈焰之中，才能得到赦免。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «El arrepentimiento en prisión es tan solo una pálida sombra de la verdadera transformación del alma. Solo en batalla, renunciando a la carne y cubriendo el alma de llamas, es posible obtener la absolución».
languages.original_text: "Repentance in prison is but a weak shadow of a true transformation of the soul. Only in battle, by abjuring the flesh and cloaking the soul in flame, can one earn absolution."

traits.locale_text: «El arrepentimiento en prisión es tan solo una pálida sombra de la verdadera transformación del alma. Solo en batalla, renunciando a la carne y cubriendo el alma de llamas, es posible obtener la absolución».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「獄中でのリペンタンスは、魂の真の変革における弱き影に過ぎない。戦いの中でこそ、肉を捨て、魂を炎に晒すことでのみ、人は赦しをえることができるのだ」
languages.original_text: "Repentance in prison is but a weak shadow of a true transformation of the soul. Only in battle, by abjuring the flesh and cloaking the soul in flame, can one earn absolution."

traits.locale_text: 「獄中でのリペンタンスは、魂の真の変革における弱き影に過ぎない。戦いの中でこそ、肉を捨て、魂を炎に晒すことでのみ、人は赦しをえることができるのだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Buße im Gefängnis ist nur ein schwacher Schatten einer wahren Transformation der Seele. Allein in der Schlacht kann man Absolution erlangen, indem man dem Fleisch abschwört und die Seele in Flammen hüllt."
languages.original_text: "Repentance in prison is but a weak shadow of a true transformation of the soul. Only in battle, by abjuring the flesh and cloaking the soul in flame, can one earn absolution."

traits.locale_text: "Buße im Gefängnis ist nur ein schwacher Schatten einer wahren Transformation der Seele. Allein in der Schlacht kann man Absolution erlangen, indem man dem Fleisch abschwört und die Seele in Flammen hüllt."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « La repentance dont certains font preuve en prison n'est que l'ombre d'une transformation de l'âme véritable. L'absolution ne peut s'obtenir qu'au combat, quand le moment vient de renoncer à sa chair et de draper son âme de ferveur. »
languages.original_text: "Repentance in prison is but a weak shadow of a true transformation of the soul. Only in battle, by abjuring the flesh and cloaking the soul in flame, can one earn absolution."

traits.locale_text: « La repentance dont certains font preuve en prison n'est que l'ombre d'une transformation de l'âme véritable. L'absolution ne peut s'obtenir qu'au combat, quand le moment vient de renoncer à sa chair et de draper son âme de ferveur. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Hapishanede tövbe etmek, ruhun gerçek manada dönüşümünün silik bir gölgesidir. Kişi yalnızca savaşta, bedenini inkâr edip ruhunu alevlerle çevreleyerek kurtuluşa erebilir."
languages.original_text: "Repentance in prison is but a weak shadow of a true transformation of the soul. Only in battle, by abjuring the flesh and cloaking the soul in flame, can one earn absolution."
